item.title: <fx-case>
item.description: Description Defines one ‘page’ of a fx-switch element. Attributes Name Description label optional label name a unique name to be used with fx-toggle Events Name Description select dispatched to fx-case when a case gets selected deselect dispatched to fx-case when case gets deselected Examples Repeat in Switch TEI header editor sample Switch
